issue.title: [CF 357] Easy group deletion
issue.body:
Allow a key (ctrl, shift, etc) to bypass the group deletion confirmation, AND/or don't ask if the group has no icons that are set up for anything (their textures are default).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #357 | Raw

comments.body:
Also, offer to delete a group when moving the last icon out of it via right-click-drag


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
